column1: #text=After eating breakfast this morning I noticed that it was time for me to get off to work so I decided to walk down to the train station so I could be off to work .
#text=I always take the same train to work every day and I usually see a lot the same faces when I ride the train .
#text=I bought a ticket at the front and waited for the train to arrive .
#text=Once the train arrived I boarded the train and took a seat .
#text=I had to go 6 stops before I would arrive to work so I took out my phone and decided to send out some emails .
#text=After the first few stops the train started to get quite crowded so I decided to stand and give my seat up to an elderly gentleman .
#text=He was thankful for the seat and I was happy to do him the favor .
#text=The train then arrived at my stop and I got off to make my way to work .
#text=It was another enjoyable experience on the train .
